channel.title: blendOS on Peter Roehlen
channel.description: Recent content in blendOS on Peter Roehlen

item.title: Multiple Distribution Support in blendOS is no Gimmick
item.description: I initially thought the ability of blendOS to run packages from multiple Linux distros might turn out to be a gimmick but I was wrong.

item.title: blendOS Is Really Nice
item.description: I’ve been using blendOS for a few days now and itâ€™s really nice. I installed the KDE/Plasma version and everything just works really well which was a welcome relief after screwing around with Guix and NixOS for weeks.
